${ModID}:SlidingStrike.NAME: Sliding Strike
${ModID}:SlidingStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s|0=s} next turn.

${ModID}:Impulse.NAME: Impulse
${ModID}:Impulse.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! {@@}card{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL Exhaust one of them. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TerribleThought.NAME: Terrible Thought
${ModID}:TerribleThought.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Backtrack.NAME: Backtrack
${ModID}:Backtrack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Aggression.NAME: Aggression
${ModID}:Aggression.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ToothAndNail.NAME: Tooth And Nail
${ModID}:ToothAndNail.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:RushPast.NAME: Rush Past
${ModID}:RushPast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Next turn, gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:Euphoria.NAME: Euphoria
${ModID}:Euphoria.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Ethereal, draw !M! more {@@}{!M!|>1=cards|@=card}.

${ModID}:TimeSlow.NAME: Time Slow
${ModID}:TimeSlow.DESCRIPTION: You cannot take damage, lose HP, or gain debuffs this turn.
${ModID}:TimeSlow.FLAVOR: "I wish this moment could last forever."
${ModID}:TimeSlow.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: III. You smile while looking up at the stars. "I wish this moment could last forever."

${ModID}:HazyStrike.NAME: Hazy Strike
${ModID}:HazyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Dazed to your discard pile.

${ModID}:Elude.NAME: Elude
${ModID}:Elude.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to each enemy that intends to attack.

${ModID}:Unsettle.NAME: Unsettle
${ModID}:Unsettle.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! Weak and ${ModID}:Foretold. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${ModID}:InevitableForm.NAME: Inevitable Form
${ModID}:InevitableForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL The first {@@}{!M!|>1=!M! cards|@=card} you play each turn costs 0 and Exhaust{!M!|1=s}.
${ModID}:InevitableForm.FLAVOR: You were always just out of reach, or mere moments late.
${ModID}:InevitableForm.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: XIV. You looped over and over. Yet you could never stop it. You were always just out of reach, or mere moments late.

${ModID}:SuddenClarity.NAME: Sudden Clarity
${ModID}:SuddenClarity.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Ethereal cards drawn cost 0 this turn.

${ModID}:Motivation.NAME: Motivation
${ModID}:Motivation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Ethereal card, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.NAME: Before Your Eyes
${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Ethereal card is Exhausted, add a random card to your hand.
${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.FLAVOR: But again, you were too late.
${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: XII. But again, you were too late. She fell to the ground right before your eyes.

${ModID}:Demoralize.NAME: Demoralize
${ModID}:Demoralize.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak, Vulnerable, and ${ModID}:Foretold. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Demoralize.FLAVOR: You wake up in an unfamiliar place...
${ModID}:Demoralize.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: XVII. You wake up in an unfamiliar place. Your transgressions on time had not gone unnoticed.

${ModID}:FadeAway.NAME: Fade Away
${ModID}:FadeAway.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL A random card in your hand becomes Ethereal.

${ModID}:DreadfulStrike.NAME: Dreadful Strike
${ModID}:DreadfulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only be played if there is an Ethereal card in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have an Ethereal card in my hand.
I ~will~ ~not~ have an Ethereal card in my hand?
I... ~didn't?~ have an Ethereal card in my hand.

${ModID}:ObscuringHaze.NAME: Obscuring Haze
${ModID}:ObscuringHaze.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL If you have an Ethereal card in your hand, gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:Reverie.NAME: Reverie
${ModID}:Reverie.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a card. NL It becomes Ethereal.
${ModID}:Reverie.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw a card. NL It becomes Ethereal.
${ModID}:Reverie.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: VII. Her eyes were two half-moons. It was the last thing she saw, it's bright form penetrating the rain.

${ModID}:Predict.NAME: Predict
${ModID}:Predict.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! ${ModID}:Foretold. NL Shuffle {@@}{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=!${ModID}:m2!|@=a} *Vision{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s|0=s} into your draw pile.

${ModID}:AheadOfTime.NAME: Ahead Of Time
${ModID}:AheadOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add an Ethereal copy of the top card of your draw pile to your hand.

${ModID}:Lacerate.NAME: Lacerate
${ModID}:Lacerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase each of the enemy's turn-based debuffs by !M!.
${ModID}:Lacerate.FLAVOR: You see someone sprawled out across the ground.
${ModID}:Lacerate.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: V. As you returned, you saw her sprawled out upon the ground, her assailants face obscured by a hood.

${ModID}:LetGo.NAME: Let Go
${ModID}:LetGo.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top card of your draw pile. NL {@@}Gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:WideOpen.NAME: Wide Open
${ModID}:WideOpen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Apathy.NAME: Apathy
${ModID}:Apathy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Forget: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength.
${ModID}:Apathy.FLAVOR: You can just try again, right?
${ModID}:Apathy.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: XV. You were filled with a creeping feeling of apathy. You can just try again, right?

${ModID}:ViciousCycle.NAME: Vicious Cycle
${ModID}:ViciousCycle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever a card is Exhausted, ${ModID}:Flashback.
${ModID}:ViciousCycle.FLAVOR: You knew it was wrong, dangerous.
${ModID}:ViciousCycle.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: IX. You can fix this. You can go back. You knew it was wrong, dangerous. You were messing with forces beyond your means.

${ModID}:PhaseShift.NAME: Phase Shift
${ModID}:PhaseShift.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. Add 2 Dazed into your discard pile.

${ModID}:Discern.NAME: Discern
${ModID}:Discern.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a *Vision on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Vision.NAME: Vision
${ModID}:Vision.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You've lived through this moment hundreds of times.

${ModID}:RecurringDream.NAME: Recurring Dream
${ModID}:RecurringDream.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if you played a *Recurring *Dream this turn or last turn.

${ModID}:Persist.NAME: Persist
${ModID}:Persist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.NAME: Moment Of Truth
${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.DESCRIPTION: Every second time you play a *Moment *Of *Truth, reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn.
${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.FLAVOR: This time, things will be different.
${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: X. You arrived at your destination, and glanced at your astronomical clock. It hadn't happened yet. This time, things will be different.

${ModID}:Languish.NAME: Languish
${ModID}:Languish.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Endurance.NAME: Endurance
${ModID}:Endurance.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile with 2 less Block.

${ModID}:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
${ModID}:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each debuff on the enemy.

${ModID}:TimeLoop.NAME: Time Loop
${ModID}:TimeLoop.DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of the last card you played this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I haven't played a card yet this combat.
I ~will~ ~not~ have played a card by then...
${ModID}:TimeLoop.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: XVIII. Again? The memories of each loop weigh on you like an impossible burden. Of course you'd do it again.

${ModID}:EtchedInBlood.NAME: Etched In Blood
${ModID}:EtchedInBlood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Next turn, add that card to your hand.

${ModID}:LineUp.NAME: Line Up
${ModID}:LineUp.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Choose a card from your draw pile to put on top.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to put on top of your draw pile:

${ModID}:OverAndOver.NAME: Over And Over
${ModID}:OverAndOver.DESCRIPTION: Put the first card you play each turn on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Overwhelm.NAME: Overwhelm
${ModID}:Overwhelm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double this card's damage this combat.
${ModID}:Overwhelm.FLAVOR: Each time hurts more than the last.
${ModID}:Overwhelm.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: XVI. Each time hurts more than the last. As you prepared to loop again, a horrible beating noise fills your ears...

${ModID}:Haunt.NAME: Haunt
${ModID}:Haunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play an Ethereal card, this enemy loses !M! HP.

${ModID}:Harrow.NAME: Harrow
${ModID}:Harrow.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Manifest.NAME: Manifest
${ModID}:Manifest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next Ethereal card you play costs 0.

${ModID}:ClingingOn.NAME: Clinging On
${ModID}:ClingingOn.DESCRIPTION: The first time a card is Exhausted each turn, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Her.NAME: Her
${ModID}:Her.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Shuffle a Void into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Her.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: II. You danced together, in union under the stars. How could you ever forget?

${ModID}:FutureSight.NAME: Future Sight
${ModID}:FutureSight.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s}.

${ModID}:HighGround.NAME: High Ground
${ModID}:HighGround.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL ${ModID}:Flashback 1 Attack. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SawItComing.NAME: Saw It Coming
${ModID}:SawItComing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is ${ModID}:Foretold, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Glimpse.NAME: Glimpse
${ModID}:Glimpse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Vision into your draw pile.

${ModID}:InternalBleeding.NAME: Internal Bleeding
${ModID}:InternalBleeding.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack an enemy, it loses !M! HP if it is Weak. Repeat for Vulnerable and ${ModID}:Foretold.
${ModID}:InternalBleeding.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: VI. "Please! You can hear me! Right? Please..."

${ModID}:CarefulScheme.NAME: Careful Scheme
${ModID}:CarefulScheme.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain {@@}{!M!|repeat=[E] }. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s|0=s}.

${ModID}:Fathom.NAME: Fathom
${ModID}:Fathom.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL They become Ethereal.

${ModID}:SlashDash.NAME: Slash Dash
${ModID}:SlashDash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:NeverEnough.NAME: Never Enough
${ModID}:NeverEnough.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, ${ModID}:Flashback.

${ModID}:Monsoon.NAME: Monsoon
${ModID}:Monsoon.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Monsoon.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: VIII. As the rain washed her blood away, a single thought filled your head: "It should've been me."

${ModID}:TheSecondDream.NAME: The Second Dream
${ModID}:TheSecondDream.DESCRIPTION: If you've played 3 or more Ethereal cards this turn, take an extra turn after this one. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:TheSecondDream.FLAVOR: During the dream, you remembered everything clearly.
${ModID}:TheSecondDream.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: I. Every loop numbed your memory further. So many experiences. But during the dream, you remembered everything clearly.

${ModID}:PierceTheVeil.NAME: Pierce The Veil
${ModID}:PierceTheVeil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each card in your Exhaust pile.

${ModID}:BackupPlan.NAME: Backup Plan
${ModID}:BackupPlan.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Forget: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:TheStarsAligned.NAME: The Stars Aligned
${ModID}:TheStarsAligned.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Vision into your draw pile. NL *Visions cost 0 until played.
${ModID}:TheStarsAligned.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: XIII. She looks at you knowingly, and sputters: "Don't come back for me..."

${ModID}:Gaze.NAME: Gaze
${ModID}:Gaze.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Foretold.

${ModID}:EyesWideOpen.NAME: Eyes Wide Open
${ModID}:EyesWideOpen.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle {@@}{!M!|>1=!M!|@=a} *Vision{!M!|>1=s|0=s} into your draw pile.

${ModID}:LowVisibility.NAME: Low Visibility
${ModID}:LowVisibility.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL Exhaust 1 card at random.

${ModID}:RecklessAbandon.NAME: Reckless Abandon
${ModID}:RecklessAbandon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for each Ethereal card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:RecklessAbandon.FLAVOR: What was I so angry about?
${ModID}:RecklessAbandon.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: XI. All you saw was red. When you came back to, the figure was ravaged.

${ModID}:Prescience.NAME: Prescience
${ModID}:Prescience.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Invoke.NAME: Invoke
${ModID}:Invoke.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s|0=s} from your draw pile into your hand. Add{!M!|1= a} Dazed where {!M!|1=it was|@=they were}. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Invoke.FLAVOR: An interruption. Something needed your attention?
${ModID}:Invoke.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: IV. An interruption. Something needed your attention. Your expertise. You promised to be right back.
